fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
You can see into private channels, administer actions, votes, and have the same power the host does. The hosts decisions override your own.
You are allowed to redirect two people per game, and whoever you redirect cannot be attacked for the night.
Attributes:
You cannot vote or speak.
Nobody will be able to target you with actions or vote you.
If you are caught making a mod error, you automatically lose.
If you prevent the host from making a mod error, you get one more use of your ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the game runs without any errors being made, or see the town win.
